Bibliographic References: LCS, p. 203, no. 28a, pi. 80,1 (reverse); Suppl. Ill, p. 99, no. 51.
Imagery Description: (a) Standing draped woman, resting r. arm on pillar, Eros beside seated woman looking into mirror, halfNon Sepcifieddraped youth; bust of silen, above, (b) draped woman with fillet in r. hand, young satyr bending forward with phiale in r. hand
